node.title: Two men, one woman arrested over West Auckland murder
node.description: Three people have been arrested and charged with murder for the killing of Robert Hart in the Auckland suburb of New Lynn last week.
node.content:
["Three people have been arrested and charged with murder for the killing of Robert Hart in the Auckland suburb of New Lynn last week.", "", "
\nPhoto: NZ / Marika Khabazi\n
", "Emergency services were called to a Great North Road address on 5 November, where they discovered the 40-year-old injured in the driveway. He died at the scene.", "Waitemat\u0101 CIB detective inspector Kevin McNaughton said in a statement the Operation Metals investigation team executed a search warrant at a West Auckland address today, with the assistance of the Armed Offenders Squad.", "Three people - two men aged 31 and 37, and a 20-year-old woman - were arrested and charged with murder.", "All three are due to appear in the Wait\u0101kere District Court tomorrow.", "Police said the investigation is ongoing and further charges cannot be ruled out.", "They ask anyone with information to contact the enquiry team direct on (09) 839 0602 or call Crime Stoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111."]
